text: Luis Miguel Oliver (born 4 August 1959) is a Spanish rower. He competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Spain Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Luis Miguel Oliver
